description: This file defines a React component for creating a new booking (either hotel or flight) in a Next.js web application. It manages form state, fetches booking data via an API, and navigates to a payment page upon submission.

methods.name: NewBookingPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the booking form and handling user interactions.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Asynchronous function to initiate a booking and redirect to the payment page, with fallback in case of error.
